column5: I came across a boat for sale, problem is the asking price is ridiculously low, by at least 10K.  A sale is always awesome, but the offering price is pretty suspicious.  The person states she has just gotten divorced, or getting one...and it is her boat now?  What should I look into before, or if, I proceed with this venture?

Before you do anything else, make sure she's got the sole authority to sell and that there are no liens registered against it. Vindictive spouses do some pretty nasty things in retribution. Then you can start to wonder why the boat is under-priced.  JF
id get a letter from the financer to state its got clear title no leins etc then go for it
